ing.item: Chedder cheese to cover tops of pepper

directions.step: 1. Cut peppers in half and de-seed. 2. Put on a cookie sheet cut side up. 3. Cook sausage, crumbly. 4. Drain the fat, and mix the sausage with the cream cheese* 5. Spoon this mixture onto the jalopeno halves, and top with a little cheese. 6. Bake in a pre-heated 350 degree oven until cheese has melted.
